long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: bash-4.3$ amdump normal Can't locate Tie/StdHash.pm: ./Tie/StdHash.pm: Permission denied at /usr/share/perl5/base.pm line 99. ...propagated at /usr/share/perl5/base.pm line 108. BEGIN failed--compilation aborted at /usr/lib64/perl5/vendor_perl/Amanda/Config/FoldingHash.pm line 3. Compilation failed in require at /usr/lib64/perl5/vendor_perl/Amanda/Config.pm line 753. BEGIN failed--compilation aborted at /usr/lib64/perl5/vendor_perl/Amanda/Config.pm line 753. Compilation failed in require at /usr/sbin/amdump line 29. BEGIN failed--compilation aborted at /usr/sbin/amdump line 29.
bash-4.3$ amcleanup normal Can't locate Tie/StdHash.pm: ./Tie/StdHash.pm: Permission denied at /usr/share/perl5/base.pm line 99. ...propagated at /usr/share/perl5/base.pm line 108. BEGIN failed--compilation aborted at /usr/lib64/perl5/vendor_perl/Amanda/Config/FoldingHash.pm line 3. Compilation failed in require at /usr/lib64/perl5/vendor_perl/Amanda/Config.pm line 753. BEGIN failed--compilation aborted at /usr/lib64/perl5/vendor_perl/Amanda/Config.pm line 753. Compilation failed in require at /usr/sbin/amcleanup line 26. BEGIN failed--compilation aborted at /usr/sbin/amcleanup line 26.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): amanda-3.3.7p1-1.fc22.x86_64 amanda-client-3.3.7p1-1.fc22.x86_64 amanda-libs-3.3.7p1-1.fc22.x86_64 amanda-server-3.3.7p1-1.fc22.x86_64

There is a bug with the latest upstream version 3.3.8. Could you please verify whether the bug is fixed?
Relevant scm-commit is http://pkgs.fedoraproject.org/cgit/rpms/amanda.git/commit/?h=f22&id=c6e090ceb846020b43893aaac1779faf3551a60e
If the bug is fixed, close the bug please.

This is a no go still.
bash-4.3$ amdump normal Can't locate Tie/StdHash.pm: ./Tie/StdHash.pm: Permission denied at /usr/share/perl5/base.pm line 99. ...propagated at /usr/share/perl5/base.pm line 108. BEGIN failed--compilation aborted at /usr/lib64/perl5/vendor_perl/Amanda/Config/FoldingHash.pm line 3. Compilation failed in require at /usr/lib64/perl5/vendor_perl/Amanda/Config.pm line 753. BEGIN failed--compilation aborted at /usr/lib64/perl5/vendor_perl/Amanda/Config.pm line 753. Compilation failed in require at /usr/sbin/amdump line 29. BEGIN failed--compilation aborted at /usr/sbin/amdump line 29. bash-4.3$ exit exit [root@ ~]# rpm -qa | grep amanda | sort amanda-3.3.8-1.fc23.x86_64 amanda-client-3.3.8-1.fc23.x86_64 amanda-libs-3.3.8-1.fc23.x86_64 amanda-server-3.3.8-1.fc23.x86_64
This package has changed ownership in the Fedora Package Database. Reassigning to the new owner of this component.

New upstream version of amanda (3.3.9) has been released. Could you please verify whether the bug is fixed?
Relevant scm-commit is http://pkgs.fedoraproject.org/cgit/rpms/amanda.git/commit/?h=f23&id=007ffffec08a253feccd096f25a82000f5fd1a39
If the bug is fixed, close the bug please.

The problem still exists.
bash-4.3$ amdump normal Can't locate Tie/StdHash.pm: ./Tie/StdHash.pm: Permission denied at /usr/share/perl5/base.pm line 99. ...propagated at /usr/share/perl5/base.pm line 108. BEGIN failed--compilation aborted at /usr/lib64/perl5/vendor_perl/Amanda/Config/FoldingHash.pm line 3. Compilation failed in require at /usr/lib64/perl5/vendor_perl/Amanda/Config.pm line 753. BEGIN failed--compilation aborted at /usr/lib64/perl5/vendor_perl/Amanda/Config.pm line 753. Compilation failed in require at /usr/sbin/amdump line 29. BEGIN failed--compilation aborted at /usr/sbin/amdump line 29.

Additionally, amdump now complains "'/usr/bin/tar' binary is not secure".
This appears to be an incorrect.
amanda-3.3.9-2.fc23 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 23. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-7b6f54ca75
amanda-3.3.9-2.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-2acd2eed98

I have just added patch from upstream, which should solve described problem.
If the problem will not persist, please close this bug, otherwise I will looking for another solution.
Relevant scm-commit is: http://pkgs.fedoraproject.org/cgit/rpms/amanda.git/commit/?h=f24&id=222578a274145fd9dc6b74b3f0dcfa6424a30ce4

amanda-3.3.9-2.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-2acd2eed98

See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-7b6f54ca75

Ok, the original problem seems to be fixed.
http://wiki.zmanda.com/man/amanda-security.conf.5.html
Seems to suggest the file is NOT required if things are at the default locations and not symlinks. These conditions are true, but the file must exist.
